author: andreas
content:
Thanks. I'll do my best ðŸ™‚

As to David, he is a weird guy. I mean, why would you have a blog and not allow for comments? But then, he is one of the great trend setters, a real innovator. Funny, there was a time in my life, when the only music that I could bear, were records by the Talking Heads. Really. Everything else sounded shallow to me. Must have been weird myself ðŸ™‚
